name: World Wonder Discovery
description: This is the ultimate Yucatan experience, a different kind of a tour.  Small, personal groups of no more than 10 people explore first-hand some of the most famous wonders of the Mayan world.  Start at the most incredible Mayan ruins site, Chichen Itza, where you'll gain insight into this amazing relic of the past and the people of the Mayan civilization.
